attributes.action: HELP STUDENTS TO STUDY IN THEIR OWN COUNTRY
attributes.additional_details: Student who are attempting to study for a degree in their own country are being turned down why? We need more doctors. My daughter is being forced to study in Europe after completing a biomedical science degree because our universities won't accept her. Why can we not train doctors here and make them repay with time to the NHS. Help people to better a better future.
